data.message: I want this how do I activate it?

replies.message: Hi Bonnie. We will decide whether or not to activate Safety Check primarily depending on the scope and impact of the event, and trusted sources. If you are in the affected area, you will get a Facebook notification, see an alert at the top of your News Feed and receive an SMS from Facebook (if you have SMS enabled), asking if you are safe. Clicking on any of these messages will take you to Safety Check where you can mark yourself safe and check on others. In addition, you will see a bookmark on Facebook that takes you directly to the Safety Check. -Hailey
Facebook announced that 12 March Likes reduced, if the Today page and return to normal?
